replies.body: You wound me... I will exclusively target scuttle in our next game
Look at how adorable they all are. just like bronze. it is also exactly as toxic.

http://media.giphy.com/media/QB78LMb32YqoE/giphy.gif

and here I was thinking we were all friends
How dare you compare the adorable Trubbish to bronzies? Trubbish just want to be loved.
I want to hate it since I'm in bronze but gosh dang its too cute
